summary: This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.It's Male Only.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.It's Male Only.

Undertand that the hood/HoodedMask were tailored to humans heads.So they kind of create minor to huge clipping issues when used with other races.I'm planing to fix this in the next Update but don't expect custom masks for Kathjit,orcs or Argonians.I'm just going to fix the ears clipping and that's pretty much it.I made a maskless hood for them since the mask seem to fit elves.

*Armor Defense Base Ratings:

-Gloves:19
-Boots:17
-Hood:12
-Hooded Mask:15
-Cuirass:40

*Where to find them

-In a guarded Locked Chest located East of the Nightcaller Temple near Dawnstar.(check the Map pic).

-To any forge assuming you have the Glass smithing perk.The armor is temper-able too.


*Installation

To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu



*Term of Use

i don't want any part of this mod being modified and/or used in other mods and games without my consent.
